overview:
Experienced and motivated senior marketing professional with eleven years’ experience in the IT/Telecoms industry. Self-starter with a sustained track-record of creating growth through the development, introduction and marketing of compelling business propositions that monetize market opportunities through the sales and alliance channels.

Driving growth through strategic business and partner development; promoting brand awareness through influential media communications and thought leadership; enabling success through compelling and creative product marketing.

Specialties • Business and Partner Development – proposition development, go to market strategy and operational planning, partner development, customer outreach and innovation, pipeline development • Media Communications and Thought Leadership – press relations, analyst relations, blogging and social networking • Product Marketing – professional copy and info-graphic skills for the development of sales assets (papers, presentations and multimedia), solution design and bid support
